related_materials.name: Polyallomer Quick-Seal Centrifuge Tubes 1 x 3.5 in

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6inas","text":"Plate 293 cells in CellSTACK double chamber in  media (DMEM with 10% FBS and 1% Penicillin/Streptomycin) so that at the moment of transfection they reach 80% confluence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5gc7t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"AF8BCD307D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cusjv","text":"When the cells reach 80% confluence, they are ready to be transfected. While preparing the transfection reagents, change the incubator CO2 level to 3%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8uag1","text":"Prepare transfection reagents and set aside at  : 2x Hepes Buffer Saline (HBS), sterile H2O and 2.5 M CaCl2 in water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9shpp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A1D2C5407D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ca4t4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7n5as","text":"Prepare DNA/CaCl2 solution: when the cells are approximately 80% confluent, prepare total of 200-400 µg of DNA (1:1:1 molar ratio for pAAV and helper plasmids) in   CaCl2 solution in sterile H2O (CaCl2 final concentration 0.25M).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":163,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"713i4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"B84477B07D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jv9u","text":"Prepare the transfection mix: Place 1  of 2x HBS in a 50mL tube.  Using a 5 mL pipette, bubble solution from the bottom of the tube while slowly adding the CaCl2/DNA mix.  Bubbles should appear at approximately the same rate at which the drops are released into the solution.  The final volume at the end of this step will be   1/10 of the volume of the cells plated on the cell stacks.  If higher volumes of reagents are needed, the final volume can be adjusted according to this ratio.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":326,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"chett","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"BC3FC1307D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"CD8A7B607D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84bbh","text":"Place a small droplet of the transfection mix on a small plate or slide and view under the microscope.  The DNA precipitates should look like small particles and be visible in the center of the drop.  If they look like large particles or aggregates, discard the mix and attempt to re-bubble the solution.  If unsuccessful, prepare new solutions and repeat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98nk3","text":"Add the transfection mix to   of fresh 5% DMEM (DMEM with 5% FBS and 1% penicillin/streptomycin).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3dnau","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"D46D06507D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v6qv","text":"Gently remove media from the cell stack and replace it with the   5% fresh media/transfection mix.  Swirl the stack gently and return it to the incubator.  Incubate for   to   ; do not disturb the cells during this time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":169,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":175,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ard02","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"220","error":false,"guid":"D84251407D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":72000,"guid":"E65560107D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"DC366ED07D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9k979","text":"Check the cells: the precipitate from the transfection mix should be visible on the cells and mostly in the areas of the stack with no cells attached.  Discard the media and add   of PBS or DMEM.  Gently rock the stack to wash and discard the solution.  Replace with   of fresh DMEM with 5% FBS and incubate at 5% CO2 for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":178,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":267,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":322,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2onor","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"F293D5F07D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"F7190FF07D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"FAF70D707D6011ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"64h8e","text":"Resuspend pellet with 10 ml 1x GB buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"famlh","text":"Pour the media off the cell stack into a 500 mL centrifuge bottle. Separate three   aliquots of this media in conical tubes. Add 0.5 M EDTA to each of the first two tubes, to a final concentration of 10 mM (1-2 ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7oc9a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"00CBD1E07D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eflii","text":"i. Add the contents of one tube of media/EDTA to the cell stack and rock gently, tapping the sides of the stack to detach the cells. Return this media/EDTA back to the 50 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnkbn","text":"ii. Add the contents of the second tube of media/EDTA to the cell stack and rock gently until the cells come off the stack. It should take no longer than . Return this media/EDTA back to the 50 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":153,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4nhf8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"0A2020207D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2o9a","text":"iii. Wash with the third tube of media, without EDTA. If the stack has cells wash with fresh media, HBSS or PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97uc6","text":"iv. Use the third tube to wash the first two (EDTA) tubes – cells cling to the tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9i7eq","text":"v. Return the contents of all the conical tubes to the 500 mL centrifuge bottle and incubate for about   in an   bucket with water/ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":103,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"11k6g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"12CDA7107D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"17CCF3107D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3mr1","text":"vi. Spin down at   at 500x g for   or 1000 x g for  . If still floating cells are present, spin extra  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c6qtj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2E444AD07D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"23570D107D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3A30F7307D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3DD0B3307D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9knc0","text":"vii. Pour off the media completely and, if necessary, use a pipette to remove any remaining media drops.It is very important that all media be removed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bssqk","text":"Resuspend pellet with   1x GB buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2mf54","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"43020BB07D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fgf99","text":"Freeze   for at least   if purifying on the same day (or until purification day). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"33fo1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"46CB6FC07D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"4C0776A07D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6gnsc","text":"Thaw in  ° water bath.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1g04m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5068D4F07D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"42","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7r59","text":"Sonicate: Wash sonication probe with H20, then 70% alcohol, then H20 again and wipe with a clean kimwipe. Lyse with a sonication probe: output control – 3, duty cycle % - 30.Sonicate for 6 to 10 beats. The probe should be ~1 cm from the tube bottom.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90nmd","text":"Freeze in   for  . Thaw in   water bath – Freeze/thaw like this 3x. (Can do last freeze O/N, and proceed to benzonase step next day).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":16,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"capc8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"59AC81607D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"5D9442E07D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"60856F607D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"42","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5gri2","text":"Bring sample to , add CaCl2 (use 4uL of 2.5M stock CaCl2) and then treat with Benzonase (2uL in 10mL) at   for  -swirl every 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":78,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":105,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fptjg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"660647707D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6E867CD07D6111ECA9D03FD4D2FBE1AC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"560F9B607DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqmg7","text":"CaCl2 (2.5M for transfection) – 2500x, so use 4Ll in 10mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d90jp","text":"Benzonase (25 KU stock), need 500 units, so add 2uL to 10 mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsl8k","text":"Centrifuge at 3000 x g for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2mnmc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"6E881A507DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"70DBCE507DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54shp","text":"Transfer supernatant to new tube, store at     (or continue on).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5e6ep","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"778791D07DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"7B4E36C07DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4on3t","text":"Prepare optiprep gradients – Mix, store at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3b25s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"88FC69407DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10ai8","text":"Centrifuge in ti70 rotor at 360,000g (70,000rpm) for  ,  , use acceleration and deceleration protocol #9.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":59,"length":46}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8j47i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":4200,"guid":"9EB4B6C07DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AB4811A011A011ED80CD37CFEA023299","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cnk2o","text":"Collect virus fraction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"20k7g","text":"i. Puncture tube at 58/40 interface with 18G needle attached to 10ml syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9raf","text":"ii. Collect about   with bevel up and 2 ml with bevel down. AVOID PROTEIN BAND AT 40/25 INTERFACE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"68ksm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"B7CC5BE07DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebv8d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ke9s","text":"Equilibrate the Millipore® membrane in a 15 mL conical tube with   PBS-Mg: Add solution to the membrane and centrifuge at 2000 x rpm in TC room until all liquid has passed through (about  ).Check after   if the liquid is going through at same speed in different columns. If there is one there is washing faster discard and take a new one (that means the column could be damaged). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":187,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":202,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1os48","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"C011F9407DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"CAC785307DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"CF2205B07DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9k1hq","text":"Discard the PBS-Mg from bottom of the conical tube and load the virus solution. Centrifuge at the same speed until only   remains above the filter (about  ).Add   PBS-Mg and pipette up and down with a P1000 pipette without touching the membrane. Spin down as before until 1 mL remains. Repeat five times. During the last wash, spin down and leave only 300-500 μL above the membrane in which to recover the virus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":154,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":161,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5d4r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"D4ADDA407DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"D93DE9B07DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"DCC69B407DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1obho","text":"Wash down the sides of the membrane by pipetting this volume. Transfer to a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube. Wash twice with 100-200 μl PBS-Mg while scratching back and forth over the membrane with the pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ikuv","text":"Do a quick spin on the bench top centrifuge before sonication to have all the pieces of membrane on the bottom. Sonicate 6 bursts/beats (output control 1.5-2, duty cycle % - 30) to break up viral aggregates. Centrifuge at 5000 x g for   at . Transfer supernatant to a new tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":235,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":239,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"44veu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"EE9F8BB07DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F0FE3C307DEC11ECB4D5D1B190826905","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47m76","text":"Equilibrate a 0.22μm filter with 500 μl PBS-Mg. Aspirate the volume with a 18 1/2 GA needle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"74k0f","text":"Using the same needle and syringe, aspirate the virus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qrtg","text":"Gently pass the virus through the filter. Collect into a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
